actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to remove certain prohibitions to the licensing of a vessel for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States for the vessels Ben Milam and William B. Travis.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to issue certificates of documentation for two named vessels.

titles.title: A bill to remove certain prohibitions to the licensing of a vessel for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States for the vessels Ben Milam and William B. Travis.
